first_level.name: Audible Glamer
first_level.description: This spell creates any sound the caster desires, from a whisper to a roar.

first_level.name: Change Self
first_level.description: This spell allows the caster to alter their appearance, including height, weight, and facial features.

first_level.name: Color Spray
first_level.description: This spell creates a cone of colored light that may blind or stun creatures.

first_level.name: Dancing Lights
first_level.description: This spell creates 1-4 lights that can be moved and controlled by the caster.

first_level.name: Detect Illusion
first_level.description: This spell detects illusions in the area of effect.

first_level.name: Gaze Reflection
first_level.description: This spell reflects gaze attacks back at the attacker.

first_level.name: Hypnotism
first_level.description: This spell hypnotizes 1-4 creatures, making them susceptible to suggestion.

first_level.name: Light
first_level.description: This spell creates a light source equivalent to a torch.

first_level.name: Phantasmal Force
first_level.description: This spell creates an illusion that can be seen, heard, and felt.

first_level.name: Spook
first_level.description: This spell causes a creature to flee in panic.

first_level.name: Ventriloquism
first_level.description: This spell allows the caster to throw their voice to any point within range.

second_level.name: Blindness
second_level.description: This spell causes a creature to become permanently blind.

second_level.name: Blur
second_level.description: This spell makes the recipient's outline blurry, giving them a -2 penalty to hit.

second_level.name: Deafness
second_level.description: This spell causes a creature to become permanently deaf.

second_level.name: Detect Invisibility
second_level.description: This spell allows the caster to see invisible creatures and objects.

second_level.name: Fog Cloud
second_level.description: This spell creates a fog that obscures vision and provides concealment.

second_level.name: Hypnotic Pattern
second_level.description: This spell creates a pattern of light that hypnotizes creatures who look at it.

second_level.name: Improved Phantasmal Force
second_level.description: This spell creates an illusion that can be seen, heard, and felt, and can cause damage.

second_level.name: Invisibility
second_level.description: This spell makes the recipient invisible until they attack or cast a spell.

second_level.name: Magic Mouth
second_level.description: This spell creates a magical mouth on an object that speaks when triggered.

second_level.name: Mirror Image
second_level.description: This spell creates 1-4 mirror images of the caster that move with them.

second_level.name: Misdirection
second_level.description: This spell makes divination spells target a different creature or object.

second_level.name: Phantom Steed
second_level.description: This spell creates a phantom horse that can carry the caster at great speed.

third_level.name: Continual Light
third_level.description: This spell creates a permanent light source equivalent to a torch.

third_level.name: Dispel Illusion
third_level.description: This spell cancels illusion spells in the area of effect.

third_level.name: Fear
third_level.description: This spell causes a creature to flee in panic for 1 round per level of the caster.

third_level.name: Hallucinatory Terrain
third_level.description: This spell creates an illusion that makes one type of terrain appear as another.

third_level.name: Illusionary Script
third_level.description: This spell creates writing that can only be read by a specific creature or type of creature.

third_level.name: Invisibility 10' Radius
third_level.description: This spell makes all creatures within 10' of the recipient invisible until they attack or cast a spell.

third_level.name: Nondetection
third_level.description: This spell prevents divination spells from detecting the recipient.

third_level.name: Paralyzation
third_level.description: This spell paralyzes a creature for 2-8 rounds.

third_level.name: Phantom Steed
third_level.description: This spell creates a phantom horse that can carry the caster at great speed.

third_level.name: Rope Trick
third_level.description: This spell makes a rope climb into the air and create an extradimensional space.

third_level.name: Spectral Force
third_level.description: This spell creates an illusion that can be seen, heard, and felt, and can cause damage.

fourth_level.name: Confusion
fourth_level.description: This spell causes creatures in the area to become confused and act randomly.

fourth_level.name: Emotion
fourth_level.description: This spell causes creatures in the area to feel a specific emotion.

fourth_level.name: Fear
fourth_level.description: This spell causes creatures in the area to flee in panic.

fourth_level.name: Hallucinatory Terrain
fourth_level.description: This spell creates an illusion that makes one type of terrain appear as another.

fourth_level.name: Illusionary Wall
fourth_level.description: This spell creates an illusionary wall that can be seen, heard, and felt.

fourth_level.name: Improved Invisibility

fourth_level.name: Massmorph
fourth_level.description: This spell makes creatures in the area appear as trees.

fourth_level.name: Minor Creation
fourth_level.description: This spell creates a non-living object of vegetable matter.

fourth_level.name: Phantasmal Killer
fourth_level.description: This spell creates an illusion of the target's worst fear, which may kill them.

fourth_level.name: Rainbow Pattern
fourth_level.description: This spell creates a pattern of colored light that fascinates creatures who look at it.

fourth_level.name: Shadow Monsters
fourth_level.description: This spell creates shadowy monsters that can attack and cause damage.

fifth_level.name: Advanced Illusion
fifth_level.description: This spell creates an illusion that can be seen, heard, and felt, and can cause damage.

fifth_level.name: Chaos
fifth_level.description: This spell causes creatures in the area to act randomly and chaotically.

fifth_level.name: Demi-Shadow Monsters

fifth_level.description: This spell creates an illusion that makes one type of terrain appear as another.

fifth_level.description: This spell creates a permanent illusion that can be seen, heard, and felt.

fifth_level.name: Projected Image

fifth_level.name: Telekinesis
fifth_level.description: This spell allows the caster to move objects with their mind.

sixth_level.name: Conjure Animals

sixth_level.name: Demi-Shadow Magic
sixth_level.description: This spell creates shadowy versions of other spells that are 80% real.

sixth_level.name: Mass Suggestion

sixth_level.name: Mislead

sixth_level.name: Permanent Illusion
sixth_level.description: This spell creates a permanent illusion that can be seen, heard, and felt.

sixth_level.name: Shadow Monsters
sixth_level.description: This spell creates shadowy monsters that can attack and cause damage.

seventh_level.name: Alter Reality

seventh_level.name: Conjure Elemental

seventh_level.name: Mass Invisibility

seventh_level.name: Permanent Illusion
seventh_level.description: This spell creates a permanent illusion that can be seen, heard, and felt.

seventh_level.name: Power Word, Stun
